lines.text: [telling Steve Walker about Blackbeard's tenth wife]
[raises her voice and startles Steve]

"EDWARD TEACH, sometimes known as Captain Blackbeard, when you come to die, may your body and soul be racked between this world and the next, always to be alone! May this curse hold fast and true, may you be held forevermore in limbo, until such time as there be found in you, most wicked of all villains - "
[laughs maniacally]
" - some spark of human goodness!"
30 AM. Please be prompt.
You took that money.
Money? Money... OH, the odd flimsy I removed from the pocketbook of your book-ish wench.
What manner of craft be this we're cruisin' in?
It's an automobile.
Eh?
An automobile!
Oh, is it? Yes. An "automotonus". Yes, "auto-some-o-nee-mones!"
It's that rotten pirate, he did it!

[referring to Blackbeard]
You know something, I think I'm really gonna miss the old scoundrel.
You know something? I loved you even when I thought you were nuts.

''Come on coach will you we've come in last in two events already''. Ew another beanrake. All right play it whatever way ya like ya puppy. You'll get no help from me. You'll come crawling back you will! I'll bring my boot to ya and I'll grind ya mealy mouth jibb into the dirt! I will.
Hey Coach! Shockley Just cleared 6' 11. And they're trying for 7 feet!
Our Shockley?

[Steve has just punched Seymour]
Oh quite nice lad, yes!
Hey Coach! Shockley Just cleared 6' 11. And they're trying for 7 feet!
Our Shockley?
By thunder! This raises my blood! There be a time for action! Hang on old ladies, Blackbeard's coming! Up the Jolly Roger!
I did have a treasure. I had a big treasure. Lovely, I did. But I spent it all in one week. Among the flesh pots and gambling hells of Port Royal oh what a glorious week!
Oh you know what you are? You are a total loss you're not even a respectable ghost! You're a phoney! A phoney!
I don't think you're real and I don't think that sword is real. I'm going to walk straight through it and go to bed!
Beware all wenches.
